features.title: Next-gen solutions designed to help you grow revenue

0.title: Capture 100% of customers, no marketing opt-in needed
0.description: Advanced analytics drives data-driven decisions, offering predictive insights, personalized recommendations, real-time analysis, cost savings, and risk mitigation. Choose advanced analytics for strategic decision-making and business growth.

1.title: Get a true health score on customer retention
1.description: Move beyond revenue tracking to understand your restaurant's customer health. By capturing a unique profile for each visitor, you'll see an accurate score of your customer retention rates, providing a clear snapshot of how often guests return and the strength of their loyalty.

2.title: Collect contacts, boost database marketing
2.description: Effortlessly grow your contact list when customers claim redeemables by scanning a QR code on their receipt. Once added, you can send targeted updates, exclusive offers, or online store promotions to keep your restaurant top of mind.
2.imageAlt: Phone scanning QR code on receipt

3.title: Drive return visits with targeted redeemables
3.description: Encourage repeat business with tailored redeemables. Set thresholds, like spending minimums, to trigger exclusive return offers that bring customers back, keeping them engaged and driving loyalty.

0.title: Dedicated Customer Support
0.description: Our team is always ready to help, ensuring your business stays up and running.

1.description: Get started with Oddle Terminal within 2 business daysâ€”quick, easy, and hassle-free.

hero.title: Stop Overpaying for Reservations - Break Free from Monthly Fees and High Commissions Costs
hero.description: Helping Restaurants Save More on Reservations While Driving More Sales, Every Day with Pricing that Makes Sense.

affordableSection.title: An Affordable Reservation System Without the Catch
affordableSection.description: Most reservation systems cost you more than they give back. Oddle Reserve is differentâ€”no subscriptions, no hidden fees, just simple, usage-based pricing.

0.title: Low-Cost, Usage-Based Pricing
0.description: Only pay for the reservations you take.

1.title: Grow Revenue With Every Booking
1.description: Turn reservations into repeat visits with built-in customer engagement tools.

2.title: Designed for Restaurants Like Yours:
2.description: Tailored solutions for every stage of your business.

useCases.title: Built for Restaurants of Every Kind

0.title: Traditional Restaurants Going Digital
0.description: Facing digitalization challenges with the next generation stepping in, but hesitant about costly subscriptions? Oddle Reserve's pay-as-you-go model makes the transition seamless, eliminating steep monthly fees.
0.imageAlt: Dim sum dishes on a table representing traditional restaurants

1.title: Restaurants With High Walk-Ins
1.description: With many walk-ins and limited online reservations, managing big group bookings can be challenging. Oddle Reserve's usage-based pricing lets you pay only when you need it, making it an ideal solution for occasional but essential online reservations.
1.imageAlt: Exterior of a soup restaurant representing high walk-in restaurants

2.title: Restaurants On High-Commission Marketplaces
2.description: Paying expensive per cover to marketplaces that intercept direct bookings with ads can be frustrating. Oddle Reserve removes commissions and charges only per bookingâ€”not per coverâ€”giving you back control of your reservations.
2.imageAlt: Interior of a PizzaExpress restaurant representing restaurants on marketplaces

0.title: List View
0.description: Get a clear overview of all your reservations at a glance.

1.title: Timeline View
1.description: Visualize your bookings chronologically for better planning.

2.title: Table View
2.description: Manage table assignments and statuses efficiently.

3.title: Mobile View
3.description: Access and manage reservations on the go from any device.

system.title: Secure and Reliable Reservation Booking System
system.description: Ensure serious bookings and minimize no-shows with built-in safeguards.

0.title: Secure and Reliable Reservation Booking System
0.description: Ensure serious bookings and minimize no-shows with built-in safeguards.
0.item1: Card Guarantee: Secure reservations with credit card guarantees to reduce cancellations.
0.item2: Payment Request: Collect deposits or full payments upfront for high-value or busy periods.
0.item3: Automated Customer Confirmation: Confirm reservations automatically to save time and reduce manual work.

1.title: Customer-Friendly Features
1.description: Enhance the guest experience with convenient and flexible options.
1.item1: Guest Self-Edit Reservations: Allow guests to change or cancel bookings without the need to call, creating a smoother experience.
1.item2: Automated Status Management: Easily update and track reservation statuses with minimal effort, keeping your team aligned and operations seamless.

PricingPage.heroTitle: Grow Your Restaurant Revenue with One Integrated Platform
PricingPage.heroSubtitle: Start taking online orders, accepting table reservations, processing in-store payments, and building customer loyalty â€” all from day one, with no upfront costs. Only pay when you start serving real customers.
PricingPage.heroImageAlt: Stylized image representing restaurant growth or the Oddle platform
PricingPage.benefitUsageBased: Pay only for what you need
PricingPage.explanationDesc1: We believe in transparent, usage-based pricing. You only pay for the products you use, allowing you to scale efficiently.
PricingPage.explanationDesc2: There are no long-term contracts or hidden fees. Start with what you need and add more as your restaurant grows.
PricingPage.freeProductsDesc: Every Oddle account comes with these powerful tools at no extra cost:
